title: Busy Grandparents: Maximize Time with Your Grandchild
itunes:summary:
John and Danny describe practical ways grandparents -- working or retired -- can bless their adult children and grandchildren. Featuring Glen and Ellen Schuknecht. Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

A Spiritual Heritage: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2020-11-05?refcd=1011606

Get More Episode Resources: https://focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/busy-grandparents%3A-maximize-time-with-your-grandchild/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
